definition: to answer a question/question and answer

sentences.english: Ambassador Liu's gracious speech and answers were rewarded with rounds of ardent applause from the audience.
sentences.chinese: 现场听众对刘大使的精彩演讲和答问报以热烈掌声。

sentences.english: OSQA is an open source Question and Answer Site.
sentences.chinese: OSQA是一个开源的答问网站。

sentences.english: In short, the choice of pragmatic strategies adapt to various factors.
sentences.chinese: 总之，不同答问策略的选择顺应着多方因素的需要。

definition: to communicate by means of written notes (instead of speaking)/to publish one's opinion (e.g. as part of a scholarly dialogue)/(in book titles) essays/sketches
to complete a draft/to put out a manuscript
to take tea and chat/a small-scale informal gathering with tea and snacks
the king looked left and right and then talked of other things/to digress from the topic of discussion (idiom)
pinyin: wang2 gu4 zuo3 you4 er2 yan2 ta1

definition: to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
